EmailTemplate.name: 02. Onboarding Agenda Complete Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Your WEX Sales Onboarding is starting on {!Training_Class__c.Date__c} in Nashville Tennesee!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Start the WEX Sales Learning Journey!
Your Sales Onboarding is starting on {!Training_Class__c.Date__c}. See agenda attached.
Items to remember:
Nashville, TN -
If you are attending on-site, arrive and be ready to start by 8:30 am CST at 3100 West End Avenue, Nashville, TN 37203. If you are attending via WebEx, dial in and be ready to start by 8:30 am CST.
South Portland, ME -
If you are attending on-site, arrive and be ready to start by 9:30 am EST at 95 Darling Avenue, South Portland, ME 04106. If you are attending WebEx, dial in and be ready to start by 9:30 am EST.
Reach out to me with any questions.
{!User.Name} | {!User.Phone} | {!User.MobilePhone} WEX Global Sales Training Team
